name: Girl X Island
description:
Overview:
Welcome to "Girl X Island", an RPG visual novel game that immerses players in a captivating story of survival, adventure, and choice. Developed by a solo developer team. This game takes you on a thrilling journey as you assume the role of Peter, a young boy who finds himself stranded on a mysterious and uninhabited island after a fateful fall from a cruise ship.

Key Features:

1. Survival in a Hostile Paradise:
Step into Peter's shoes and face the ultimate challenge of surviving on an isolated island in the middle of the sea. With nothing but your wits and determination, gather essential resources through mining, gathering, hunting, and crafting to ensure your survival.

2. Interactive Storytelling:
Every corner of the island holds secrets and characters waiting to be discovered. As you explore this enigmatic world, you'll encounter various characters, each with their own unique stories and backgrounds. It's up to you to decide whether to engage with them and embark on a shared journey, or forge your path alone.

3. Stunning 3D Graphics:
Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of the island, brought to life with stunning 3D graphics. Few animations artfully support key scenes, enhancing the visual experience and drawing you deeper into the story.


Gameplay:
In "Girl X Island, you'll find yourself in a world where survival is paramount. To thrive, you'll need to:

Collect Resources: Search for valuable materials by mining, gathering plants, and hunting wildlife.

Craft Essential Items: Use the resources you gather to craft tools, weapons, and shelter, turning the harsh wilderness into a comfortable home.

Explore the Unknown: Venture into the uncharted territories of the island, discovering hidden secrets and meeting intriguing characters along the way.

Make Choices that Matter: Every decision you make will impact the story's direction, affecting Peter's fate and the relationships he forms.
